name: Capseg
tagline: CapSeg - Cancer Copy Number from Exome Sequencing
body:
### CapSeg - Capture-based segmentation of copy number from cancer exomes.

CapSeg generates copy number information from cancer samples.  It's goal is to produce allele specific copy information across the genome using matched tumor and normal samples, sequenced with whole-exome sequencing (WES).  It is a produce of the Cancer Genome Analysis (CGA) group at the Broad Institute of Harvard and MIT. 

### Placeholder

This page is currently a placeholder until the publication is finalized, at which point the source code will become publicly available.  If you're interested in beta-testing the software, please write the owner of this github.  I'll leave that as an exercise to the reader, as posting the email address here will only lead to spam.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
